abilities.ability_text: [Once per turn] Permanently reduce your character's hand size by 1: Draw 3 cards.
Commit: Your Fury or Punch attack gains Powerful: X. X equals the number of cards in your hand.
Discard 1 momentum: Add up to 3 cards from your hand to your momentum.
Permanenty reduce your character's hand size by 1: Draw 3 cards.
If this attack deals damage, build the next foundation you play face up.
If a punch attack has dealt damage this turn, draw 1 card.
If this attack is blocked, your rival flips 1 foundation.
This attack gets +4 damage.
Discard 1 card: your next attack this turn gets +4 damage.
Flip: Add 1 of your momentum to the top of your deck.
Flip: After you commit any number of cards due to your rival's effect, build the top card of your deck face down. Playable while committed.
Destroy: Add 1 Punch attack from your card pool to your momentum.
Your Punch attack gets +2 speed and gain Stun: 1.
Destroy: Return this attack to its printed damage. If it is a Punch attack, it gets +2 speed.
[Once per game]: After your Charge attack deals damage, add all cards from your card pool to your momentum. This ability cannot be canceled.
If your Charge or Stun attack is blocked, commit 1 rival foundation
This attack gets +2 damage for each card in your momentum.
Your rival commits 1 foundation for each card in your momentum.
If this attack is added to your momentum, add it face up.
[Momentum]: Flip: Commit 1 rival foundation.
If this attack is completed blocked, it still deals damage during the damage step.
If this attack is added to your momentum, add it face up.
[Momentum] Flip: Add the top card of your deck to your momentum.
Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +3 damage.
This attack gets +1 damage for each committed rival foundation.
Commit 1 foundation: Your rival commits 1 foundation.
Remove: After your Charge or Stun attack deals damage, add 1 card from your discard pile to your momentum.
Flip: If you have 1 or more momentum, ready 1 foundation that has not been readied this combat phase.
[Your attack] Discard 1 momentum: Commit 1 rival foundation.
Destroy: Commit 1 rival foundation.
Destroy: Return this non-charge attack to its printed damage.
[Once per turn]: Build the top card of your deck face down.
[Twice per turn] Add 1 foundation from your stage to your hand: This attack gets +2 or -2 damage.
Destroy 1 face down foundation: Build the top card of your deck face down.
If this attack is blocked, your rival discards 1 card.
If this attack is completely blocked, build it face down after it resolves.
If you have built a card this turn, this attack gets +1 speed and +1 damage.
Add 1 face down foundation from your stage to your hand. Build the top card of your deck face down.
Discard 1 momentum: Build 1 card from your hand face down. This attack gets +5 damage.
Your rival cannot play action cards during this attack.
Commit: After your blocked attack resolves, build it face down.
Unflip 1 foundation.
After you block with this card, your rival's next attack this turn gets -2 damage.
Commit: Your attack gets +2 damage, or if it has "Hardened" in its name, it gets +3 damage instead.
Flip: After you block with a foundation, build it face up.
Commit: Your rival's next attack this turn gets -2 damage.
Flip: After your rival plays a Stun ability, cancel it.
Before the game begins, add up to 1 copy of "ERASE!" from your deck to your discard pile, then shuffle your deck.
Discard 1 card: This attack gets +2 or -2 speed. Add 1 copy of "ERASE!" from your discard pile to your hand.
Commit: After you play or block with an action, draw 2 cards.
Remove: Seal 1 rival asset or foundation.
After an attack is played, your rival cannot play abilities on their character during this attack. Discard this card from your card pool.
Discard 1 card: Draw 2 cards.
If you have played an action this turn, this attack gets +2 speed.
If you have played an action this turn, this card gets -2 Difficulty.
If you have played an action this turn, your rival discards 1 card.
Seal 1 rival foundation.
Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +3 damage.
If this attack deals damage, draw 1 card.
Discard 1 rival momentum.
Your next attack this turn gets +2 damage.
After this card is discarded from your hand during the Enhance Step, this attack gets +1 or -2 speed.
If you have played a Combo ability this Enhance Step, your attack gets +1 damage.
Destroy: Your rival's attack gets -3 speed. If you have played an action card this turn, draw 1 card.
Remove, remove 1 action card from your discard pile: After your rival plays a non-character enhance, cancel it.
Flip: Add 1 Combo attack from your card pool to your hand.
[Once per turn] Discard the top 5 cards of your deck: Add 1 copy of "Summon Dark Shadow" from your discard pile to your hand.
This attack gets +1 or -1 damage. Only playable while committed.
While this card is in your card pool, your attacks get +1 speed and +1 damage.
Your next check to play a card this turn gets +3. Commit your character.
Actions in your card pool do not count towards progressive difficulty for the rest of this turn.
If this attack has received a speed and damage bonus, it gets +3 damage and gains Stun: 1.
If your character is committed, this attack gets +2 damage.
This attack gets +1 speed for each Ally card in your card pool.
Add 1 action from your discard pile to your card pool.
Your rival loses 1 health for each Ally card in your card pool.
Flip: This attack gets -3 damage. Only playable if you have an Ally card in your card pool.
Your Ally or Ranged attack gets +1 speed and +1 damage.
Flip: This high or low attack gets -2 speed.
Discard 1 momentum: Your next check to play a card gets +2.
Add this card to the top of your deck.
if your character is committed, this attack gets +1 damage.
After your attack is partially blocked, draw 2 cards.
[Once per game]: After an attack is completely blocked, your rival reveals their hand. Choose 1 card in their hand and discard it.
Change the zone of your attack.
If this attack is not blocked, commit 1 rival foundation.
Add 2 rival foundations to the bottom of their deck.
Commit 1 foundation: This attack cannot be blocked by mid blocks.
Commit 1 foundation: If this attack is not blocked, your rival discards 1 card.
Commit 1 foundation: Change the zone of this attack.
If the zone of this attack is high, it gets +2 speed.
If the zone of this attack is low, it gets +2 damage.
This attack cannot be completely blocked.
After the zone of this attack is changed, it gets +2 damage.
Discard 1 momentum: Change the zone of this attack. This enhance is playable any number of times this Enhance Step.
After this card is committed during the Enhance Step, this attack gets +1 or -1 speed. Playable while committed.
Flip: Change this attack's zone to mid.
Flip: This mid attack gets -2 speed.
Commit 1 foundation: Change the zone of your attack.
If the zone of your attack has been changed, it gets +1 speed and +1 damage.

Flip: choose 1 of the following effects:
  • Both players discard 1 momentum.
  • The next attack this turn loses EX.
  • The next attack this turn loses Powerful.
  • The next attack this turn loses Stun
Name an attack zone [low, mid or high]: If your rival's next attack this turn matches that zone, it gets -3 speed.
[Once per turn] Discard your hand: Your Punch attack gets +10 damage.
Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +5 speed. Only playable if this attack's damage is 10 or greater.
Add this card to your hand after it resolves. Only playable if this attack's damage is 15 or greater.
Draw 1 card for each copy of "Future Charge" in your card pool.
Your rival commits 1 foundation for each Punch attack in your card pool.
If this attack deals 5 or more damage, draw 1 card.
Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +3 speed.
Your next attack this turn gets +3 speed.
Add 1 foundation from your stage to your momentum.
